tool_description: Automaic creation of audio loops and beats
name: zVloopy
title: zVloopy

api_list.name: create beat
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zvloopy.p.rapidapi.com/blob/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zvloopy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
